member.name: T:WaveEngine.TiledMap.TiledMap
member.summary: Load and store all information concerning Tiled Maps (.TMX) files. To create/edit .tmx files you need to use Tiled Map Editor (http://www.mapeditor.org/)

member.name: F:WaveEngine.TiledMap.TiledMap.tmxStreamAssetsPath
member.summary: The tmx stream assets path (used with tmxStream)

member.name: P:WaveEngine.TiledMap.TiledMap.TmxPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the Path of the Tiled Map TMX file

member.name: P:WaveEngine.TiledMap.TiledMap.MinLayerDrawOrder
member.summary: Gets or sets the draw order of the last layer.

member.name: P:WaveEngine.TiledMap.TiledMap.MaxLayerDrawOrder
member.summary: Gets or sets the draw order of the first layer.

member.name: P:WaveEngine.TiledMap.TiledMap.Version
member.summary: Gets the TMX format version, generally 1.0.

member.name: P:WaveEngine.TiledMap.TiledMap.Orientation
member.summary: Map orientation. Tiled supports "orthogonal", "isometric", "staggered" and "hexagonal" (since 0.11.0) at the moment.

member.name: P:WaveEngine.TiledMap.TiledMap.RenderOrder
member.summary: The order in which tiles on tile layers are rendered. Valid values are right-down (the default), right-up, left-down and left-up. In all cases, the map is drawn row-by-row. (since 0.10, but only supported for orthogonal maps at the moment)

member.name: P:WaveEngine.TiledMap.TiledMap.StaggerAxis
member.summary: Stagger Axis. For staggered maps, indicates if the tiles are ordered in X axis or Y axis.

member.name: P:WaveEngine.TiledMap.TiledMap.StaggerIndex
member.summary: Stagger Index. For staggered maps, indicates if the tiles index is odd or even.

member.name: P:WaveEngine.TiledMap.TiledMap.HexSideLength
member.summary: The tile side length for hexagonal maps.

member.name: P:WaveEngine.TiledMap.TiledMap.BackgroundColor
member.summary: The background color of the map. (since 0.9.0)
